name: Avoid Red: Snake Jump
description:
Is arcade game. Goal of the game is to survive as long as possible and achieve the highest score

Basic rules

  • Jump from one snake to another in a direction of arrow. For performing jump use SPACE key
  • If you are located on snake, you are moving with it
  • Stay on the screen and take reward within 30 seconds otherwise you will lose life
  • After taking reward length of new snakes will decrease so you can have problem jumping on them. For increasing new snakes length take + symbol
  • You can increase life by taking heart symbol
  • Avoid everything red. It will cost you a life

Installation

  • Unrar downloaded file AvoidRed.rar
  • Run Game\AvoidRed.exe
  • In the settings of game choose if you want to play in window or fullscreen mode
  • If you have problem with hearing sound effect or music in the background please install directx_Jun2010_redist located in folder DirectX
